original_title: The Very Best Of Slim Dusty
overview: In November 1942 at the ripe age of 15, the boy from a small farm in Nulla Nulla, NSW. David Gordon Kirkpatrick registered & first signed his newly adopted stage name... Slim Dusty. Over the following 60 years Slim has gone on to release a record breaking 100 plus albums, sold more albums in Australia than any other country artist & achieved more Gold & Platinum sales awards than any other Australian Artist.
title: The Very Best Of Slim Dusty
